job_tasks.phrase: implementing a new offering that focuses on K8s., * Implementing features. From the proposal, through spec and implementation, to maintenance.
job_tasks.justification: The phrase describes the entire software development lifecycle, from inception to maintenance of features, directly aligning with traditional software development tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: You're expected to propose things that you think can be a good addition to the products
job_tasks.justification: This indicates a role in suggesting and implementing new functionalities, which is a part of the software development process.

job_tasks.phrase: Reviewing code. We believe in code reviews. And you will soon start reviewing pull requests as well!
job_tasks.justification: Code reviews and reviewing pull requests are standard practices in software development to ensure code quality and maintainability.

job_tasks.phrase: Improving the health of the codebase. We're mindful of accumulating technical debt. We dedicate one day per week to housekeeping
job_tasks.justification: Maintaining and improving the codebase, including managing technical debt, is a core aspect of software development.

job_tasks.phrase: The team plans and discusses the upcoming work.
job_tasks.justification: Discussing upcoming work and planning indicates involvement in understanding and aligning technical efforts with broader team or product goals.

job_tasks.phrase: The team plans and discusses the upcoming work. We provide feedback to each other, trying to find challenges and unknowns as early as possible
job_tasks.justification: The mention of team planning, discussion, and providing feedback to each other highlights collaboration and communication skills.

soft_skills.phrase: The team plans and discusses the upcoming work. We provide feedback to each other, trying to find challenges and unknowns as early as possible
trying to find challenges and unknowns as early as possible
You're expected to propose things that you think can be a good addition to the products

classification.rationale: This job description focuses on traditional software development tasks and Kubernetes operations. There is no mention of generative AI, large language models, or related generative techniques, which are the core focus of the GenAI Engineer profile.
